parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.48

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Weapons

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns current rate of how much the weapon view is distorted because of quick aiming

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> _inertia = [[weaponInertia]] [[player]];

</value></part></template></root>
